_sText:
Based on the machine shop in dead space, this map uses real Dead Space audio to capture the authentic feeling of the game, then at 60 seconds, the glass breaks and kills any campers or afk people by turning into an vacuum airlock. It is a simple ergonomic gungame type map, with exceptional likeability
Already been tested on 
Evil Smurfs Gungame servers

at 60 seconds the maps glass breaks and color correction turns the entire hallway into a white color, then air escapes and players slowly die of Hypoxia (lack of oxygen)

This map contains

********Color Correction*********( so turn it on )
Normal VVIS compilation
Normal Vrad compilation
Custom Dead Space Audio
Custom Dead Space Textures
Pakratted in (no tricky installation)
"oxygen" releasing pipe at 60 secs
36 spawns
Make sure you turn your color correction on (in video settings) for a great visual experience***

A great Skybox texture by [-B-]

small, ergonomic map overall

Everyone please enjoy!
the map file size accounts for custom material
Thank you!
